purpose: Solve Multi-Agent Path Finding problems efficiently over the long term
principle: Utilizes heuristic search algorithms to optimize pathfinding for multiple agents over time
reusability: The solver can be integrated into larger systems requiring multi-agent coordination, with customizable parameters for different scenarios
limitations: Primarily focused on pathfinding; may not handle dynamic changes in agent goals or environments without re-computation
name: RHCR
description: An efficient solver for lifelong Multi-Agent Path Finding
highlight: Efficient solver for lifelong Multi-Agent Path Finding (MAPF) problems
